item.title: Debian Server
item.description: This is a short Manual on how to configure a Debian virtual Server hosted at HTW FB4. General Things Snowflakes Configuring a server manually results in a Snowflake Server. I’ve logged the config changes as best I could in this repo, check the commits: https://github.com/htw-imi-networks/example-config Shell & Path … TBD Path $ echo $PATH Editor You should be able to survive in one of the available editors, e.g. VI Set the default editor to ensure it is used eg.
